HOME.TITLE: Hi !
HOME.PARAGRAPH_1: My name is Victor-Stefan Iacob and yes you guessed it... I am a programmer.
HOME.PARAGRAPH_2: I am still a student in my first year of Data Science at Babes-Bolyay University in Cluj-Napoca.
HOME.PARAGRAPH_3: In 2023, I have completed my current highest academic level: the Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science at the same university.
HOME.PARAGRAPH_4: Since I was a child, I really started to enjoy technology.
HOME.PARAGRAPH_5: Years later, I got my first job as a software developer and yeah.. my back hurts after just 2 years...

Programming skills necessary to extract data from various sources of information
Ability to approach problems from different angles and to be aware of complementarities in knowledge on interdisciplinary teams

ENTRY_1.TITLE: ViCarGo
ENTRY_1.SUBTITLE: Peer-To-Peer Car Sharing Concept, implemented in a Mobile Application using Ionic
DESCRIPTION: The mobile application leverages modern technologies and user-friendly interfaces to foster a seamless interaction within the sharing community. By harnessing the power of smartphones' connectivity and location services, users can effortlessly identify the most suitable car that aligns with their preferences.
If you would like to know more about my Bachelor Thesis, I invite you to open the link below or feel free to contact me on LinkedIn.

ENTRY_2.TITLE: VIC - Virtual Information for Cinemas
ENTRY_2.SUBTITLE: Backend: Python / Frontend: Angular
DESCRIPTION: It is an app designed for cinemas around the city which gather all the movies in one place.
Still a prototype, but it has some nice designed built in with the help of Angular attributes and scss.
Users can reserve their seat by inputting name, phone number and email address.
Movies can be filtered by cinemas or by genre.

MUSIC.TITLE: Music
MUSIC.DESCRIPTION: As a music enthusiast, I like to go to big concerts and listen to my favorite artists live. From repeating lyrics in the shower, I had never thought that I was going to listen to The Weeknd live, but I had the opportunity to see him last year and it was amazing.

SWIMMING.TITLE: Swimming
SWIMMING.DESCRIPTION: Swimming is a passion of mine since I was a little kid. Until 2018, I used to go to the biggest swimming competitions in Romania and collected over 170 medals in total. In 2017, I had the opportunity to represent Romania at European Youth Olympic Festival.

SKIING.TITLE: Skiing
SKIING.DESCRIPTION: It's strange because at first, skiing was so scary and I didn't like it at all. But, with the help of my friends I managed to get to the bottom of the slope and I have never missed my yearly ski vacation since.

TRAVELLING.TITLE: Travelling
TRAVELLING.DESCRIPTION: There is not much to talk about in here. Get the salary -> Plan the next trip -> Enjoy it -> Repeat :)
